description.native_language: Learn basic greetings like 'Hello' and 'Goodbye'.
description.target_language: Aprender saludos básicos como 'Hola' y 'Adiós'.

evaluation_criteria: User produces the word 'Hola' in correct context
User produces the word 'Adiós' in correct context

description.native_language: Learn how to count from 1 to 10 in Spanish.
description.target_language: Aprender a contar del 1 al 10 en español.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly identifies numbers 1-10
User uses number names in correct context

description.native_language: Learn basic colors like red, green, and blue.
description.target_language: Aprender los colores básicos como rojo, verde y azul.

evaluation_criteria: User produces the word 'rojo' in correct context
User produces the word 'azul' in correct context
User produces the word 'verde' in correct context

description.native_language: Learn to understand and use 'yes' and 'no'.
description.target_language: Aprender a entender y usar 'sí' y 'no'.

evaluation_criteria: User produces the word 'sí' correctly
User produces the word 'no' correctly

example_incorrect.native_language: Noo, I do not want it.

description.native_language: Learn to introduce yourself using your name.
description.target_language: Aprender a presentarte usando tu nombre.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'me llamo' to introduce themselves
Correctly uses name within introduction

description.native_language: Expand from basic numbers to counting up to 100.
description.target_language: Expandir de números básicos a contar hasta 100.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly identifies numbers 11-100
User uses number names in a counting sequence

description.native_language: Familiarize with days of the week and months of the year.
description.target_language: Familiarizarse con los días de la semana y los meses del año.

evaluation_criteria: User produces names of days and months accurately
User uses day or month name appropriately in context

description.native_language: Learn names of common everyday objects.
description.target_language: Aprender nombres de objetos cotidianos comunes.

evaluation_criteria: User uses object names like 'libro', 'mesa', 'silla' correctly
User associates object names with correct functions

description.native_language: Learn vocabulary related to family members.
description.target_language: Aprender vocabulario relacionado con los miembros de la familia.

evaluation_criteria: User uses words like 'madre', 'padre', 'hermano' correctly
Associates family terms with correct gender

description.native_language: Learn basic food vocabulary like bread, water, and apple.
description.target_language: Aprender vocabulario básico de alimentos como pan, agua y manzana.

evaluation_criteria: User uses words like 'pan', 'agua', 'manzana' correctly
Identifies food items in simple sentences

description.native_language: Vocabulary for basic weather conditions.
description.target_language: Vocabulario para condiciones climáticas básicas.

evaluation_criteria: User uses weather terms like 'lluvia', 'sol', 'nublado' correctly
User describes weather using simple phrases

example_correct.native_language: There is a lot of rain.

description.native_language: Learn basic directional words like left, right, and straight.
description.target_language: Aprender palabras direccionales básicas como izquierda, derecha y recto.

evaluation_criteria: User uses directional terms like 'izquierda', 'derecha', 'recto' correctly
Provides basic directions using these terms

description.native_language: Vocabulary for describing common daily activities.
description.target_language: Vocabulario para describir actividades diarias comunes.

evaluation_criteria: User uses activity words like 'comer', 'correr', 'leer' correctly
User integrates activity terms into basic sentences

description.native_language: Learn vocabulary related to daily routines and habits.
description.target_language: Aprender vocabulario relacionado con rutinas y hábitos diarios.

evaluation_criteria: User uses routine terms like 'desayunar', 'acostarse' correctly
Forms sentences using verbs in present tense related to routines

example_correct.target_language: Desayuno a las 7 de la mañana.

example_incorrect.target_language: Desayuno a las 7 de la mañana.

example_incorrect.native_language: Ella se acuesta en la tarde.

description.native_language: Learn vocabulary to talk about hobbies and leisure activities.
description.target_language: Aprender vocabulario para hablar sobre aficiones y actividades de ocio.

evaluation_criteria: User uses hobby-related terms like 'pintar', 'jugar', 'nadar' correctly
Discusses hobbies using present tense verbs

description.native_language: Learn vocabulary related to travel, such as 'airport', 'ticket', and 'luggage'.
description.target_language: Aprender vocabulario relacionado con el viaje, como 'aeropuerto', 'billete' y 'equipaje'.

evaluation_criteria: User uses travel vocabulary like 'aeropuerto', 'billete' correctly
Constructs sentences involving travel scenarios

example_correct.native_language: I need a ticket to Madrid.

description.native_language: Learn essential health vocabulary for visits to the doctor or pharmacy.
description.target_language: Aprender vocabulario de salud esencial para visitas al médico o la farmacia.

evaluation_criteria: User uses health terms like 'doctor', 'medicamento', 'hospital' correctly
Forms basic health-related questions and sentences

description.native_language: Learn to use simple greetings such as 'hello' and 'goodbye'.
description.target_language: Aprender a usar saludos simples como 'hola' y 'adiós'.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Hola' as a greeting correctly
User uses 'Adiós' for farewells correctly

description.native_language: Learn to use 'yes' and 'no' in affirmative and negative responses.
description.target_language: Aprender a usar 'sí' y 'no' en respuestas afirmativas y negativas.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Sí' as an affirmation correctly
User uses 'No' as a negation correctly

description.native_language: Learn to use numbers 1-10 in sentences.
description.target_language: Aprender a usar los números del 1 al 10 en oraciones.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'uno' to 'diez' in grammatically correct sentences
User produces numbers in proper sequence

description.native_language: Learn to use basic colors in sentences.
description.target_language: Aprender a usar colores básicos en oraciones.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'rojo', 'azul', 'verde' in context
User matches color adjectives with nouns in gender and number

description.native_language: Learn to use definite and indefinite articles 'el', 'la', 'un', 'una'.
description.target_language: Aprender a usar los artículos definidos e indefinidos 'el', 'la', 'un', 'una'.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly uses 'el' and 'la' with appropriate nouns
User correctly uses 'un' and 'una' depending on noun gender

description.native_language: Learn to conjugate regular -AR verbs in the present tense.
description.target_language: Aprender a conjugar verbos regulares -AR en presente.

evaluation_criteria: User produces sentences with correct present tense -AR verb endings for subject pronouns
User uses -AR verb conjugations consistently in sentences

description.native_language: Learn to use basic subject pronouns like 'yo', 'tú', 'él/ella'.
description.target_language: Aprender a usar pronombres básicos de sujeto como 'yo', 'tú', 'él/ella'.

evaluation_criteria: User uses subject pronouns correctly before verbs
User chooses correct pronoun for given subject

example_incorrect.target_language: He walks a lot (incorrect pronoun-verb match).

description.native_language: Learn to form simple questions using '¿Qué?', '¿Quién?', '¿Cómo?'.
description.target_language: Aprender a formar preguntas simples usando '¿Qué?', '¿Quién?', '¿Cómo?'.

evaluation_criteria: User forms questions correctly using interrogatives and verb inversion
User uses question marks appropriately

example_incorrect.target_language: What is your name (missing opening question mark)?

description.native_language: Learn to conjugate common irregular verbs in the present tense such as 'ser', 'estar', 'tener'.
description.target_language: Aprender a conjugar verbos irregulares comunes en presente como 'ser', 'estar', 'tener'.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly conjugates 'ser' and 'estar' in sentences given subject pronouns
User uses 'tener' appropriately in sentences concerning possession

example_incorrect.target_language: He is study (incorrect verb form for subject).

description.native_language: Learn to create simple sentences using subject-verb-object structure.
description.target_language: Aprender a crear oraciones simples usando la estructura sujeto-verbo-objeto.

evaluation_criteria: User structures sentences in Subject-Verb-Object order
User produces verb at appropriate position in sentences

description.native_language: Learn to negate sentences using 'no' before the verb.
description.target_language: Aprender a negar oraciones usando 'no' antes del verbo.

evaluation_criteria: User places 'no' before the verb to negate sentences
User creates negative form in simple present tense

description.native_language: Learn to form questions using '¿Dónde?', '¿Cuándo?', etc.
description.target_language: Aprender a formar preguntas usando '¿Dónde?', '¿Cuándo?', etc.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly uses question words in sentence positions
User forms questions appropriately using question marks

description.native_language: Introduction to gendered nouns and adjective-noun agreement.
description.target_language: Introducción a sustantivos con género y concordancia de adjetivo-sustantivo.

evaluation_criteria: User matches noun and adjective in gender
User matches noun and adjective in number

description.native_language: Learn to conjugate common stem-changing verbs in the present tense.
description.target_language: Aprender a conjugar verbos comunes con cambio de raíz en presente.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly conjugates stem-changing verbs in present tense sentences
User uses correct forms for all subject pronouns

example_incorrect.target_language: I have a dream (incorrect stem change).
You can do it (missing conjugation for tú).

description.native_language: Introduction to simple past tense for regular verbs.
description.target_language: Introducción al pretérito simple para verbos regulares.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly conjugates regular -AR, -ER, -IR verbs in the past tense
User uses past tense verbs in contextually appropriate sentences

description.native_language: Learn to use conjunctions to form compound sentences.
description.target_language: Aprender a usar conjunciones para formar oraciones compuestas.

evaluation_criteria: User uses conjunctions 'y', 'o', 'pero', 'porque' correctly
User maintains sentence structure while using conjunctions

example_correct.native_language: Tengo un perro y un gato.
example_correct.target_language: I have a dog and a cat.

example_correct.native_language: Él come rápido porque tiene hambre.
example_correct.target_language: He eats quickly because he is hungry.

example_incorrect.target_language: I have a dog a cat (missing conjunction).
He eats quickly because hungry (missing verb).

description.native_language: Learn to use basic reflexive verbs like 'levantarse', 'bañarse'.
description.target_language: Aprender a usar verbos reflexivos básicos como 'levantarse', 'bañarse'.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly conjugates reflexive verbs in the present tense
User uses reflexive pronouns correctly with verbs

example_incorrect.target_language: She bathes every day (missing reflexive pronoun).

description.native_language: Learn to form simple future tense using 'ir a + infinitive'.
description.target_language: Aprender a formar el futuro simple usando 'ir a + infinitivo'.

evaluation_criteria: User forms future tense sentences using 'ir' correctly conjugated
User correctly uses 'a + infinitive' to express future actions

example_correct.target_language: I am going to study tomorrow.

example_correct.native_language: Ella va a viajar a España.
example_correct.target_language: She is going to travel to Spain.

example_incorrect.native_language: Ella va a viaja a España.
example_incorrect.target_language: She is going travels to Spain (incorrect infinitive).

description.native_language: Learn to distinguish when to use 'ser' and 'estar'.
description.target_language: Aprender a distinguir cuándo usar 'ser' y 'estar'.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly uses 'ser' for permanent states and 'estar' for temporary conditions
User uses 'ser' for identity and 'estar' for location

example_incorrect.target_language: He is being teacher (incorrect use of 'estar').
I am in home (incorrect use of 'ser').

description.native_language: Learn to use basic greetings like 'Hola' and 'Adiós'.
description.target_language: Aprende a usar saludos básicos como 'Hola' y 'Adiós'.

evaluation_criteria: User produces the word 'hola' or 'adiós' in a conversation
User answers '¿Cómo estás?' with an appropriate phrase

description.native_language: Learn to introduce yourself and others.
description.target_language: Aprende a presentarte y presentar a otros.

evaluation_criteria: User uses the phrase 'Me llamo' correctly
User introduces another person using 'Te presento a'

description.native_language: Learn to say goodbye in various contexts.
description.target_language: Aprende a decir adiós en varios contextos.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Hasta luego' appropriately
User uses 'Nos vemos' appropriately

description.native_language: Learn to ask simple questions like '¿Cómo estás?' and respond appropriately.
description.target_language: Aprende a hacer preguntas simples como '¿Cómo estás?' y responder adecuadamente.

evaluation_criteria: User asks '¿Cómo estás?' correctly
User responds to '¿Qué tal?' with an appropriate phrase

description.native_language: Learn common polite expressions like 'Gracias' and 'Por favor'.
description.target_language: Aprende expresiones corteses como 'Gracias' y 'Por favor'.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Gracias' correctly in context
User uses 'Por favor' appropriately in a request

description.native_language: Learn to use formal address forms like 'usted'.
description.target_language: Aprende a usar formas de trato formal como 'usted'.

evaluation_criteria: User uses '¿Cómo está usted?' appropriately
User responds appropriately to 'buenos días, señora'

description.native_language: Learn to use informal address forms like 'tú'.
description.target_language: Aprende a usar formas de trato informal como 'tú'.

evaluation_criteria: User uses '¿Cómo estás tú?' correctly
User responds informally to 'Hola, amigo'

description.native_language: Learn to reply affirmatively in conversations.
description.target_language: Aprende a responder afirmativamente en conversaciones.

evaluation_criteria: User affirms with 'sí' correctly in conversation
User uses 'claro' appropriately to confirm

description.native_language: Learn to offer help politely and appropriately.
description.target_language: Aprende a ofrecer ayuda de manera cortés y adecuada.

evaluation_criteria: User uses '¿Necesita ayuda?' in appropriate context
User offers help using 'Yo te ayudo' correctly

example_correct.native_language: I will help you with the bags.
example_correct.target_language: Yo te ayudo con las bolsas.

description.native_language: Learn to express gratitude in various situations.
description.target_language: Aprende a expresar gratitud en varias situaciones.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Muchas gracias' correctly
User shows gratitude with 'Estoy muy agradecido/a'

example_correct.native_language: Thank you very much for your help.
I am very grateful for your support.
example_correct.target_language: Estoy muy agradecido/a por tu apoyo.

description.native_language: Learn to make polite conditional requests.
description.target_language: Aprende a hacer peticiones condicionales corteses.

evaluation_criteria: User starts request with 'Podría' in correct context
User uses 'si pudieras' to make a polite request

example_correct.native_language: Could you please send me the document?
If you could, would you close the window?

description.native_language: Learn to share your opinion politely in Spanish.
description.target_language: Aprende a dar tu opinión de manera cortés en español.

evaluation_criteria: User starts opinion with 'Creo que' appropriately
User uses 'En mi opinión' to share a view

example_correct.native_language: I think that the movie is great.
example_correct.target_language: Creo que la película es genial.

example_correct.native_language: In my opinion, this is the best option.
example_correct.target_language: En mi opinión, esta es la mejor opción.

example_incorrect.native_language: Opinion in my, best this option.
example_incorrect.target_language: Opinión en mi, mejor esta opción.

description.native_language: Learn to accept invitations properly.
description.target_language: Aprende a aceptar invitaciones correctamente.

evaluation_criteria: User accepts with 'Claro que sí' properly
User uses 'Me encantaría' in accepting an invitation

example_correct.native_language: Sure, I would love to come!
Yes, I’d love to join you.

description.native_language: Learn to reject offers or invitations politely.
description.target_language: Aprende a rechazar ofertas o invitaciones de manera cortés.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Lo siento, no puedo' correctly
User expresses regret with 'Desafortunadamente no puedo'

description.native_language: Learn to engage in small talk about the weather.
description.target_language: Aprende a participar en conversaciones triviales sobre el tiempo.

evaluation_criteria: User comments on weather with 'Hace buen tiempo'
User uses 'Hace frío' to talk about the cold

description.native_language: Learn culturally appropriate greetings.
description.target_language: Aprende saludos culturalmente apropiados.

evaluation_criteria: User uses '¡Hola!' with accompanying gestures
User makes cultural references in greetings

example_correct.native_language: Greet with a kiss on the cheek.
example_correct.target_language: Saludar con un beso en la mejilla.

example_incorrect.target_language: Cubrir con grandeza en la mejilla.
